verbose_text: Moreover, phosphorylation on serine/threonine protein kinase (Ser350) residue of the death associated protein (DAP) leads to the translocation from the cytoplasm to the nucleus of apoptosis inducing kinase 2 (DRAK2) which is able to induce apoptosis in T and B cells.
evidence: DRAK2) which is able to induce apoptosis
